Key Match Events: The Wolves jumped out to an early 13-point lead but struggled to capitalize on opportunities and lost the game 106-98.
The Wolves committed 14 turnovers and Portland scored 21 points off of those turnovers.
The Wolves finished the game 7-39 from three-point range, shooting 17%.
Pre-Game Insights: The Wolves were 10-point favorites heading into the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Head Coach Chris Finch said, "It’s a rough patch. It’s early on."
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the second game for the Wolves in the NBA Cup group stage.
